data.message: How is it that you have posted my birthday date and I deliberitly left that out on my profile?  there is something to be said about discretion.

replies.message: Hey Carolyn. We require everyone using Facebook to provide their birthday so you always know who you're connecting with. If you do not wish share this piece of information with everyone, you can change who can see your birthday by adjusting the audience. Learn how in our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/563229410363824. -Sarah
